shortcv.p: Helen Bisbiki is a graduate of the Department of Management Science and Technology in Athens University of Economics and Business. She has a Certificate of Proficiency in English as well as a Zertifikat Deutsch als Fremdsprache in German. She has worked at the Business Development Department and the Merchant Acquiring Department of Piraeus Direct Services (Piraeus Group). Her research interests are on the e-learning field and she is currently working as a research assistant in ISTLab/OIS.
